• Download This Plugin
  • Back To jQueryScript.Net

dragNscroll Plugin Examples

A jQuery scroll on drag plugin that allows users to scroll a page (or any scrollable element) by using mouse drag, similar to the swipe up/down behavior in mobile devices.

With Default Settings
